website_summaries.verdict: For decorators who need to inflate multiple balloons, the Party Zealot is fast and efficient.
pros: Can inflate 100 balloons in under 30 minutes, or one balloon in 2 seconds
Ready to perform right out of box, no setup required
cons: Steep learning curve reported, with many burst balloons during first uses

customer_reviews.title: Fast fast fast and saves time!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. It more than exceeded my expectations. I blew up $100 ballons on like 20mins or less....it really didnt take time at all. I would recommend to anyone anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kenetha jones

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe I was spending money on a balloon blower upper. But this thing is AWESOME! The kids are so excited to use it with me! We blew up 14 balloons for our balloon stands in minutes. I'll never go back to manual! This works perfectly. One nozzle works by a switch. The other nozzle works by pushing on the nozzle , like a helium tank. It has a cord to plug into the wall which stores inside the machine when you're not using it. If you have a bunch of kids birthdays or you need a ton of balloons, this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peters

customer_reviews.title: Effortless
customer_reviews.text: Had to blow up about 60 balloons for my sisters baby shower and this got the job done effortlessly! Place balloon over pump and it completely fills balloon in about 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Charmainew

customer_reviews.title: Great for your party planning arsenal
customer_reviews.text: I created balloon garlands, so quickly with this. So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars if I could!!!! My 7 year old blew up 100 balloons in less than an hour. She asked if she could use it while I was working on party decor. When I returned into the room I was expecting her to have maybe 10 blown up but she had finished! This is a life saver and with 5 kiddos and a big outside family this will be used alot! I wish I had purchased one much sooner. I love that the motor doesn't turn on until you put a balloon on it which helps with noise.
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: You might as well blow the balloons yourself!
customer_reviews.text: I had such great hopes for this little machine! Today is Thursday and now I don’t have an air pump for the balloons I wanted for my daughter’s birthday on Saturday! With lockdown orders in place, it’s not like I can go out and find something else. I’m so frustrated! Now I have to go out to run the errand of taking this piece of crap to the UPS store to return. This machine might have been a return that got shipped to me - didn’t come with clips. Seriously guys, don’t bother ordering this!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Saves on time
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good quality for price and save you a lot of time. No more blowing up balloons and hurting your facial muscles. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is I think the machine should automatically cut off when you remove balloon from nozzle. Because machine fills balloons so fast with strong force I had to let some air out my balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya

customer_reviews.title: Great value for cost!
customer_reviews.text: This thing exceeds my expectations! I was afraid I bought a piece of junk because it’s small, bright like a kids toy and just looks kinda cheap. Well it did the job -and well!!! I didn’t want to put my lips on balloons due to covid 19 so I bought this and it works very very well. Extremely fast too. I’m hoping it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MYG

customer_reviews.title: Received used machine!
customer_reviews.text: Received used product! In all my Amazon purchases I have never had issues with the products. This time the box had been opened the product looked used. The bottom had debris. Product was not “newly packaged” power cord was haphazardly put away. It was not a new product I was unboxing. It Seems like this product was supposed to Come with balloon ties? I received none. The instruction and paperwork were all bent. I tried the machine and it seems to work. I’m not happy to receive a used item when I expected to pay for new.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last, made only 40 balloons til it malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.text: We were making a balloon garland and was working great at first, but halfway in the valve that is press automated stopped responding when pressure is applied. If you use it as the continuous mode it still works, but i dont like that considering it is loud! I ordered this super advanced and just used it today, return window has closed. I just want the press function back ☹
customer_reviews.author: ark aimee sayos

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and overly sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I think mine was defective. It was louder than an old vacuum and the nozzle that was supposed to activate if you pressed on it had a hair trigger. If you even slightly brushed against it, the machine came on. I could only use the other nozzle, which meant putting the balloon on, turning the machine on, pinching off the balloon and then turning the machine off. The machine was so loud that we decided not to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVENTION EVER!
customer_reviews.text: 38 years old and 3 children later, where has this invention been all my life? This is the BEST idea ever! Inflates balloons in seconds! Easy to use! I will never have to see the room spin from using my own hot air again! LOVE THIS! EVERYONE HAS TO HAVE ONE!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Lung saver!!
customer_reviews.text: I planned to surprise my son with a room full of balloons for his birthday. I told my husband and he suggested we get a blow up machine. I didn’t know such a thing existed. I am SOOOO glad I got the Party Zealot inflator. It made the job quick and it it’s so easy to use. I did about 25 balloons and it would have been a long tiring ordeal without the inflator. I will definitely be using it a lot in the future and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique W

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So glad I made this purchase for my balloon garland. Super easy to use and saved me so much time!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but very loud and pumps air too fast
customer_reviews.text: It’s good overall.. my only complaint is that it’s really loud and that the air comes out way too fast so you are constantly on edge that it’s about to pop. I am not sure I’d buy it again due to those factors but on the same token, i don’t plan to return it so..
customer_reviews.author: megan fox

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: This pump is awesome. It saves so much time. You can blow up one or two balloons at a time. You can adjust how much you inflate the balloons. It is plug in, so you aren't burning through batteries. Small and easy to store for the next party. I would not have attempted a balloon garland with out it- it helped make a quarantine birthday special!
customer_reviews.author: LBCM

customer_reviews.title: Very handy. Very loud.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make my own balloon arch for my son's 4th birthday. This thing made blowing up latex and mylar balloons a breeze! Making my own arch was about a 1/3 of the price of buying it, including purchasing this inflater. The only small negative is that it's super loud, so no blowing up balloons in the library or whatever you need quiet for.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Save you time and energy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday party where I had ordered hundreds of balloons. I was able to create a garland with little people help and a major help from this machine. It's very easy to use and is definitely a must for those trying to decorate a special event! It comes with different nozzles so you can blow up different balloon sizes. It does get a bit hot after some use, but I would unplug it and take a break to allow for the machine to cool down (nothing happened in my case). Planning a party with balloons? Save your time and lung energy and get this!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C.

customer_reviews.title: Great pump, the plastic ties are so handy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! I loved how it didn’t have to be constantly running while I was inflating over 60 balloons. The plastic balloon ties were perfect for making a balloon garland however they gave me a blister so maybe wrap your finger with some tape. I saved them for next time and my kids loved watching the balloons fly around when I took the ties off and deflated them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Molter

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have it.
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for balloons for the 100 plus decor banner we made. Does not work for inflatable pool toys FYI. Some people says it does, trust me, it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: G. Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked so good to fill up 200 balloons in a short amount of time. Very easy to use. My 3 year old loved playing with it to fill up balloons. We will use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My asthmatic arse needed something to help me blow up a lot of balloons without getting winded. This did the job perfectly. Relatively small so easy to travel with if you're setting up a balloon arch or needing to blow up balloons in different locations - just make sure they're an outlet. Super easy to use. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lokii

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this tiny, lightweight air pump to be so powerful. I like the fact that I have the option to either turn it on and it run constantly OR to flip the switch for it to blow up balloons at my own pace. The seller was also very responsive. I would recommend this product to anyone in need of a balloon pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. i made a balloon arch for my kids birthday party and it was so easy to do with this electric balloon inflator. Last year we used a hand pump to blow up the balloons and it took hours. With this inflator, same amount of balloons only took about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: FourUnderFour

customer_reviews.title: Great pump but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Buying this for a balloon garland I just made was the best money spent! Balloons fill up in seconds. I do think this pump it pretty loud. Every time you fill up a balloon everyone is gonna hear it in your house and with so many balloons used at one time it gets a little annoying. But I'll take the noise vs using a hand pump.
customer_reviews.author: denkellsma

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work and pops your balloons because the air is hot.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this because I thought it would be good to have but after 3 months of not using it and today was the first time I used it , I can say its a no go. It gets hot right away and pops the balloons. Do not waist your money. . Im just sad I used it three months later and cant return it .
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Tong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome party helper
customer_reviews.text: Works great I bought this for my autistic daughters residential. During covid who wants people to blow up balloons with their mouth and the kids where she lives don’t understand that so this was a great help to avoid people getting sick and it’s quick and easy
customer_reviews.author: Sibabe64

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use! The air is strong and it inflates the inflatable pool within 1 minute. It came with two nozzles which are very useful, as you don't need to turn on/off and just need to press down one nozzle and the air will come from the other one. Very nice design!
customer_reviews.author: Top Rated Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this product as I wanted it to build a balloon tower for my daughters 1st birthday. When I went to use it the first time, it worked great, no issues. It blew up about 30 balloons in under 1 hour. The reason for the 2 stars is because it only worked one time. When I tried to use the pump a few days later it stopped working. I sent an email to the company and their response was “ we have no answer for you”. Very disappointed. I had hoped to use this pump for all our special occasions and was left disappointed and with a product that doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: michael knowles

customer_reviews.title: Sooo loud!
customer_reviews.text: Not entirely thrilled with this piece. It is super loud and does not inflate the balloons that are skinny and thick materials the ones I have trouble blowing by mouth. It worked great on the regular oval balloons. Not happy with how loud this thing is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife uses it a lot
customer_reviews.text: works great and has been used multiple times...makes blowing up balloons easy...we recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: We had it on for not even 3 minutes and it is so unbelievably hot to the touch my fingers were literally being burned.
customer_reviews.author: yepthatsme

customer_reviews.title: Broke down right away
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the balloon pump to blow up some balloons for a gender reveal decoration video we were doing. Worked fine. 1 month later we tried using it again for a birthday balloon arch for a photoshoot at home and only got through 5 balloons when it stopped working. The air pump is in brand new condition and has been stored in our crafts closet. Tried different power outlets and nothing- not worth it for the amount of use it lasted through (basically only one time)
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!! Lots of balloons - BUY TWO!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! We ordered approx 500 balloons for an event & used two of these to fill them up. Made completing the balloon garland we ordered so much easier! Highly recommend!! The only drawback was that the nozzle fitting you can attach that typically works for “foil” balloons was a little difficult in blowing them up. We were able to make it work though - just more difficult than the other latex balloons we filled. Still - HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethanie Billing

customer_reviews.title: Just like the description :)
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time, arrived on time. The pump seems to be of good quality. All the nozzles work as described. I haven't had a chance to really use it because my daughter's babyshower isn't for another 3weeks. I hope the pump holds up through 2 balloon garlands. If it doesn't I'll come back with an update :)
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! must buy!
customer_reviews.text: We loved it! I was amazed at how much time we saved, also how sleek it looks! It can fit in a larger size drawer or cabinet. It was our sons first bday and this was the best purchase we made to make his zoom bday a success! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Silicon Valley mom

customer_reviews.title: A modern wonder.
customer_reviews.text: I nominate this for a Blowble Peace Prize. Works perfectly. Prevents aneurisms. My only regret is that I am 52 and am surely leaving the must blow up balloons stage of my life. A few drops of pee come out when you go too far with the air. But the learning curve is quick.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK ONCE
customer_reviews.text: I AM SO DISAPPOINTED!!!!!! THIS BALLOON PUMP DID NOT WORK ONCE. THE PACKAGING WAS OK, ALL PIECES WERE IN THE PACKAGE BUT IT JUST DID NOT WORK. HEARTBROKEN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: keida

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So glad I decided to purchase this last minute , I dont know how I would have been able to blow up so many balloons! Even came with a plastic roll to arrange my balloon garland, only took me like 30min at the most!
customer_reviews.author: denise luna

customer_reviews.title: Makes blowing up balloons easier
customer_reviews.text: Used it to blow up 130 balloons - made the task much faster! My husband and I did it together, one on each nozzle. It is pretty loud and gets hot over time so we took breaks. We didn’t use the continuous blow up feature and instead used the push down to inflate feature.
customer_reviews.author: ARK

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 2 minutes ..
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a new one my first one was not working correctly as it was coming in and out, I tried every outlet and it was in and out.. I think the item was defective Hopefully my replacement works well I really need it and want it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Natividad

customer_reviews.title: Fast, efficient and time saving
customer_reviews.text: Although I hate the color of the product😂, it works great. It blows up balloons in extremely fast speeds and came with convenient string to tie them when I was finished. Great time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Where have this machine been all of my life? OMG! At first I had no clue on how to use it lol but then I started getting the hang of things. Best thing invented lol. I used this machine to blow up over 100 balloons in less than 20-25 minutes
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it. Blowing balloons are a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t I have one of these before? I got this for making a balloon arch. I realized I should’ve bought one of these years ago. It makes blowing up balloons a breeze. If you are even considering getting one of these, buy it now. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I decided to make a bubble balloon arch for my daughter's birthday and ordered this to help save my breath. This was super easy to use and made blowing up over 100 balloons very quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes R

customer_reviews.title: Must for birthday parties/events
customer_reviews.text: Contemplated this buy but its well worth it. Made and arch for my little ones birthday and this sped up the process. Last year I blew up balloons with a handheld pump what took me 3 hours this year only 1.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 4

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast
customer_reviews.text: This machine helped me blow up balloons for a balloon arch in no time. The only thing is that it's SUPER loud and it did get a little hot under the bottom. Other than that, it did the job....just loudly.
customer_reviews.author: The Mom & Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Air automatically releases from one nozzle when machine is on
customer_reviews.text: It's good and gets the job done but one of the nozzles automatically blows air when you turn the machine on. I expected all the nozzles to only work when you press down on them to release the air. It's also very loud but again, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been hiding??
customer_reviews.text: Why am I just now finding out about this machine? It was amazing to use for a party. So fast and easy. If only it tied the balloons too LOL. Great purchase you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: REpstein

customer_reviews.title: Great inflator and great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the compact ability to take this with me. Very powerful in a small package. I did a nice large arch for a table and 2 two 7 ft columns for a graduation party. I wish i had gotten pictures, but i failed to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Minda Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Its good quality and works!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure whether it would work because of the price but the air blown from this machine is amazing. I highly recommend for anyone looking for a balloon pump since this will due just great. It 100 percent exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mariaisabel Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Fast pump!
customer_reviews.text: My office was having an event and we were able to blow up 450 balloons in around an hour and a half or so
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Essential for ballon art
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me to do this balloon arch for my daughters birthday party, it was essential to have an electric pump for this to happen, looking forward to doing more. I liked the double ballon feature, much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Balloons didn’t stay inflated. Hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: I did not enjoy this product. It didn’t really work to inflate balloons. The few it did inflate before the machine overheated, fell flat within minutes. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, and saves time
customer_reviews.text: Wow, why didn't I see this before?! This saved my time so much! It's pretty loud though, and doesn't seem sturdy, but I totally think it's great than what I paid for. All those little things included was very useful too to make this balloon arch.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H

customer_reviews.title: Life save!
customer_reviews.text: Can we say life saver!! Perfect. Easy to use and gets the job done fast! Everyone who puts on parties w balloons & doesn't have this, get it! I should have bought this long ago!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Life changing for parties!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this knowing I had several parties coming up. I can’t put into words how amazing this was for blowing up balloons for balloon arches or just to have them blown up!! Absolutely love it! I’ll never blow up another balloon with my own breath again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lana Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for party decor
customer_reviews.text: Never imagined that inflating balloon can be this simple. Moreover it comes with knotter which made life so much easy. Inflated 100 balloons in half an hour which would take me at least couple hours to do manually. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sanket

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of loud but makes making balloon decorations SOOO MUCH EASIER! We have 5 kids so we have a ton of parties and I walkways make balloon arches and balloon decor and this really saved me from the pump!
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof5

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use! Makes blowing up balloons a breeze! Money saver! I have always hated going to party city to get balloons blown up because it can get pricey. I would recommend this item for purchase, its a great investment. I gave 4 stars because the two smaller holes seemed to not blow air to fill the balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Very light weight. Plug-in adaptor. Use this for my daughter’s birthday party. The only minor CON- is it was super loud. But works like a charm. Happy with the this product.
customer_reviews.author: nicky808

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this was worth the buy but was in a crunch and needed something quick to assist with the 130 balloons I needed to blow up for my balloon decor for my bridal shower. This was soo worth it. It was super easy to use and it blew up all my balloons without any issues. This truly saved me. I definitely recommend for anyone looking to save money and blowing up your balloons yourself.
customer_reviews.author: raquel

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Sparks and is unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to blow up balloons for my daughters birthday party and after using for 5 balloons it began to spark. Tried different outlets and giving it time to cool but kept sparking. Unfortunately, missed the window for return otherwise this would have been returned. Trash, don’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: Helina Golaw

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This item worked well as soon as we plugged it in. I created about 100 balloons for the party and it took about 3 seconds to blow each with this air machine. It does get hit after awhile though.
customer_reviews.author: AMBAR

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong description. I received European cord not US. I wish I checked right after it came. Party is tomorrow and I don’t know what I am going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Y

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I felt silly for buying this but I don't know how I've done 25 years of parties without it. The inventor needs sone kind of award.
customer_reviews.author: Jenober

customer_reviews.title: A serious time saver!
customer_reviews.text: The easiest and fastest way to blow up balloons. I bought this because I was making a 16' balloon arch with over 250 balloons. This machine is a lifesaver! Worked perfectly. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best investment
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Its easy to use and a great investment for your money. I hate blowing balloons and thia pump really helps fill up the balloons in no time and bring cute little accessories to help tie the balloons, ribbon, and even some sticky tape.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most useful product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useful product, ever! Super easy to use and helps tremendously! It does get a little loud when inflating a balloon, but nothing to be alarmed about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!!
customer_reviews.text: Without this electric inflator, I wouldn’t be able to do grad party for hubby. But if it’s too warm to the touch while blowing up , just give it a little break!! Thank you seller!!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: It will scare away your pets.  That's about the worst thing I can think of.  Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight. Durable. Simple to use. Dual Action. Price perfect! There are a few images I created with this little gem!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but one everyone needs this.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs one of these, you save time, easy to use and all you need are the balloons you want to use. Only thing remember it’s electronic, so you do need where to plug in the cord, but other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable and powerful
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of power in this little machine! Super easy to use. I was able to blow up and tie off 30 balloons in just over 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lee

customer_reviews.title: Made blow up a large number of balloons easy and quick!
customer_reviews.text: This saved me so much time! I planned to make a balloon garland for my son’s birthday and if you’ve ever made one you know there are a ton of balloons to blow up! Well this pump made it super easy! I blew up over 100 balloons in 20 mins.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chan

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute MUST HAVE!! You can blow up two balloons at once. It's fast. Light weight. Small. But loud sounds like an old school vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate time saver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this electric balloon pump to make a balloon garland for a birthday party and it worked wonderfully! It's super easy to use, blows up balloons super fast, and it small and compact for storing. This saved me SO much time and worked just as it claims to. I would highly recommend this! Now all of my parties can have cool balloon decorations!
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I buy this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This saves SO much time and energy being able to blow balloons up this way! It takes like 2 seconds to blow up. This was definitely worth the money and I’m kicking myself for not buying it sooner to make my life easier with balloon arches! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product I tested it once I received it! Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balloon machine! Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great little balloon machine!! Me and my daughter have so much fun using it for balloon projects. I have used it 5 times without any issues so far. Great value for the money! Love the pink color as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Helmuth

customer_reviews.title: Works great just air no helium
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Is just air not helium. In description says no foil balloons but I blew them up with the air machine no issue just dont float because no helium
customer_reviews.author: Casberry86

customer_reviews.title: Better than a pump!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: quick and easy to use for parties, but might take a minute or two to get the hang of it. Cons: it’s loud like a vacuum, so it’s not something you would want to use at night when people are sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: barnnp

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe I survived with out it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. I look forward to kids parties decor now. So far I have used it for Halloween and a bday. Super easy. And added bonus, I plugged it during the party so kids could inflate their own balloons to play. The only thing is that it’s rather noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and easy to use. Came with a bunch of extra stuff as well as a great coupon for balloons. I blew up about 400 balloons in an hour and a half. Best purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jordana Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to give this 5 stars however orders balloons from Amazon and because of the quality the balloons ripped and I bought because it was suggested by previous customers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arne

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine truly came in handy for our daughter's baby shower. We had balloons everywhere, including balloon towers that we made and it was much easier to get the job done versus trying to blow up the old fashioned way. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Little Artist

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when we blew up balloons for baby shower! Saved a lot of effort and breath, glad we ordered it! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: sbenckiee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! You can blow up two balloons at one time very quickly. It also came with balloon ties which was helpful. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser418

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is something everyone should own! We had a lot of balloons to blow up and what would of taken us all day this machine let us get it done in 30 minutes! I love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Miricle baby

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than magic and I was able to blow up 100 balloons in 15 minutes. What a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: owlie720

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, no complaints. The little ballon tying ring is very helpful too
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: A big no no
customer_reviews.text: This lil mf was dysfunctional asf but it was too late to return it and get a new one so I had to use it like it was. The on and off button didn't work at all. It was on even when the switch was put on off. Never again. I will be returning this first thing tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Halima Adan

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love everything. Worth every penny and more. You must have it if you throw a lot of parties 🎈
customer_reviews.author: Vegas

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any event.
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. I am terrified of balloons so this made it easier for me to blow them up without popping in my face.
customer_reviews.author: Mia R Owens

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine! Must have for throwing parties! It was super affordable too. Cheaper than others I saw here.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the price. It was quick and easy to blow up the balloons for a birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: aprilchild80

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!! Great price, saved my life and my lungs. Super light weight, it takes a few times to adjust to attaching the balloons for inflation but easy to use and arrived before schedule. Would definitely recommend and possibly buy a second.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was used to blow up a ton of balloons for a baby shower. It worked well. I would recommend it for any one thinking of getting one of these
customer_reviews.author: AATampaBay

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I’d buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome product. I so needed this 3 years ago for my wedding reception. Super easy to use, lightweight, and convenient; not to mention easy to store away on a shelf. We blow up many balloons in a matter of minutes. In my opinion, it works better when using both sides to have an extra hand. It’s hard to hold one while trying to the tie the other. Amazon had quicker shipment and better pricing versus Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my daughter who has gotten into the balloon arch business. this works so well. fast and easy to operate. sure beats blowing up balloons by mouth.
customer_reviews.author: LANA COMPTON

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Hired Help!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is Amazing! What Power! It does ALL THE WORK! Just sit dow & blow em' up!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Pulliam

product_meta.title: Party Zealot Electric Balloon Inflator with 100 Balloon Ties Air Pump Dual Nozzles Balloons Blower US Standard Plug for Balloon Arch, Balloon Column Stand, and Balloon Decoration
feature_bullets: Time Saving - It takes about 2 seconds to inflate a 12" balloon, or it takes less than 30 minutes for 100 balloons inflation. Bonus: including 100 pcs Party Zealot balloon ties
Easy Carry & Storage - Comes with retail box with size 7.8 x 6 x 4.7 inches. Its size is similar to a pack of soda, but the weight is only 2.25 pounds.
Easy to Use - Inflate the balloons by press and let go the nozzle to release air into balloons. No preliminary set up require
Efficient for Latex Balloons: It's ideal for inflating small to large sizes ROUND or Olive shapes balloons. However, it's not ideal for long tail magic balloons or animal balloons.
Excellent for Fast Balloon Decoration - Save tremendous time if you are building a balloon arch or balloon column stand, making your deceleration project turn into a piece of cake
